EmailTemplate.description: Notification after all essential fields are completed on BX009 and it is ready to be sent for Regional Territory Head/ Marketing VP Approval
EmailTemplate.name: GMPL/ BX009: Completion of all fields before submission for first level approval
EmailTemplate.subject: BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' is ready to be submitted for Regional Territory Head/ Marketing VP Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi, All essential sections of BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' have been completed. Please review the BX009 and submit it for approval by Regional Territory Head/ Marketing VP. The BX009 can be accessed via {!GMPL_BX009__c.Link}.
Thanks.
